column2: American Woodmark Corp. manufactures and distributes kitchen cabinets and vanities for the remodeling and new home construction markets. The company is headquartered in Winchester, Virginia and currently employs 9,300 full-time employees. The firm offers framed stock cabinets in approximately 500 different cabinet lines, ranging in price from relatively inexpensive to medium-priced styles. Styles vary by design and color from natural wood finishes to low-pressure laminate surfaces. The product offering of stock cabinets includes approximately 90 door designs in over 20 colors. Stock cabinets consist of cabinet interiors of varying dimensions and construction options, and a maple, oak, cherry, or hickory front frame, door and/or drawer front. The firm's products are sold under the brand names of American Woodmark, Simply Woodmark, Timberlake, Shenandoah Cabinetry, Shenandoah Value Series and Waypoint Living Spaces. The firm's primary raw materials used include hard maple, soft maple, oak, cherry, and hickory lumber and plywood.
